item.title: Using Mermaid Diagrams from GitHub Gists
item.description:
While Hugo supports Mermaid diagrams natively through code blocks, sometimes you may want to reference a diagram that’s maintained in a GitHub Gist. This approach has several advantages:

  • You can update the diagram without rebuilding your site
  • You can share the same diagram across multiple posts or sites
  • You can collaborate on diagrams with others through GitHub

How to Use Mermaid Gists
